Parameters: AppBarLayout: the @B_android#support#design#widget#AppBarLayout_E@ which offset has changed
int: the vertical offset for the parent @B_android#support#design#widget#AppBarLayout_E@, in px
onOffsetChanged(android.support.design.w.Description: Called when the @B_android#support#design#widget#AppBarLayout_E@'s layout offset has been changed. This allows child views to implement custom behavior based on the offset (for instance pinning a view at a certain y value).

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an @B_android#support#design#widget#AppBarLayout_E@'s vertical offset changes.
